statements: DELETE FROM warehouse_inventory WHERE id = 1 AND product_name = 'Product A';
DELETE FROM warehouse_inventory WHERE quantity > 100 OR last_updated < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM transaction_log WHERE transaction_type = 'Sale' AND quantity_changed > 10
DELETE FROM warehouse_inventory WHERE quantity < 10 AND last_updated < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM transaction_log WHERE transaction_type = 'PURCHASE' AND quantity_changed > 100;
DELETE FROM warehouse_inventory WHERE id = 100 AND product_name = 'Product ABC';
DELETE FROM inventory_transactions WHERE transaction_id IN (SELECT transaction_id FROM inventory_audit_logs WHERE action_taken = 'Restock');
